long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save bookmarks to your https://app.maktaba.digital/ account with ease using this Chrome extension. By adding your API key from your profile on https://app.maktaba.digital/profile, you can quickly and conveniently save URLs to your account directly from your Chrome browser. Please note that this extension does not provide access to your bookmarked pages, it's only used for saving bookmarks to your account. Simplify your bookmarking process by installing this extension today.
